评论详情: I’m pleasantly surprised by the sweater… It’s thick, super soft, vibrant, versatile (outfit-wise), and feels very cool girl to me. I’m very pleased!  I bought a large and it fits great. I’m 5’7, 185 lbs, 40D.
Very cute. I've gotten a lot of compliments.

I got the black with colors on the sleeves. I love the length of this, and I love the colors on the sleeves. While I love wearing black, the pop of color is so cute! The versatility is great; I wear it at home and out. I like the weight of it as well because it’s not too heavy/hot to wear around the house. My major issue is that it pilled after the first wash. Human and pet hair also clings to the material. Because of this, I gave 3 stars. After the first wash, it already looked used and abused. Value for money: I personally think it’s too expensive (without a sale) due to the above.

评论概述: Very long in the arms, great for bunching
评论详情: Wonderful casual layer that goes with anything and a great weight. It is very roomy and can easily be added and cover a sweatshirt or sweater. Very versatile must have.
Thin, weird, not much like the picture at all.

评论概述: My new favorite sweater- if only it had pockets!
评论详情: I literally just ordered this for the stripes on the sleeves, but it quickly became my new favorite sweater.  The only thing that would make this better would be pockets! It fit nicely (I tend towards L/XL) and it washes and dries well too.
I’ve had many compliments.
I wear this sweater all the time and I'm constantly getting compliments. It's super cozy and really pulls together any outfit. It's well made and holds up to washes and dries on delicate cycle. 10/10
Super cute

So I like the sweater, it's not really thin like so many clothes are nowadays, it had some wrinkles so I followed directions and washed it. Says to lay flat to dry, there were so many more wrinkles after washing. Very disappointed by tht. I really like the sweater tho so I purchased a steamer. I have not had a chance to wear it yet, I think it's going to be a wrinkled mess after wearing it, traveling in it. Looking back I think I sld have just sent it back, but it's cute and I will wear it, won't buy anything else from the brand.
Was cheap looking and feeling
Love the colors Fits great Perfect for Fl weather
I love the colors. The fit is not as baggy as in the pictures. The sleeves aren’t as long and I sized up in order to achieve the look but it’s a great sweater and I don’t regret buying it.
Cute oversized fit. Im 5’ 11” and it covers my butt. Can be dressed up or down. A little itchy which is the only reason I took off a star.
Great for my son's football game. No coat needed.

I received this sweater in the pink color...it is exactly what I expected. I read all the reviews stating it is cheaply made, etc....I think for $39 it is a bargain. It is a Long Sweater with cute striping on the sleeves. Perfect for fall and winter!

评论概述: Cute sweater for a great price!
评论详情: Purchased for my daughter as a Christmas gift when it was on sale. Sweater is very cute and seems well made. It is meant to be a little oversized, but it still fit her well and didn’t look sloppy. We live in MN and the weight of this sweater seems like it will work year round.
Loved the sweater, soft and thick. It was a gift. She's still raving about it!

I love the way the sweater looks and it is a nice fit. However, it develops massive amounts of pills on the arms and sides of the body very quickly so it doesn’t look nice and sleek anymore. And, unlike any sweater I’ve had before, this one attracts more hair and fuzz!!  And, no matter how much I use a tape roller or static sheets or wash and hang to dry outside, it just fills up with fuzz and hair and any animal you walk by, the hair just seems to fly off of it and right onto the sweater.  Never seen anything like it.

I was SO excited to order this... it had been in the carts for months! I was a little disappointed when I received it. It is SO BIG. Please size down, maybe 2 sizes. Quality is eh. I will be returning, unfortunately.
It fits great and is very flattering but seriously scratchy! I put in the dryer with a dryer ball on air dry. Would probably melt in the dryer since it’s 100% acrylic

It’s a very cute sweater. It’s well-made. But I am returning it. I just can’t put my finger on it. Maybe I should’ve ordered a size smaller it does seem to run very big. I am 5’8 and 250, and I ordered the 2X cause I wanted it to be oversized. I probably could’ve got away with the extra large not sure I will re-order.

Love this cardigan. A friend of mine had one in cream and I just absolutely loved it on her so I had to get my own (I know lame but the heart wants what it wants). I ordered it in 3 different colors because I couldn't decide and ended up keeping the black. It's super comfy. The material could be a little softer but overall it's got a nice feel and definitely warm. I size down from a medium to small as it runs big.
This sweater is not warm the texture feels terrible against your skin very strange sweater I kept it but I was very disappointed.😡🥶

I ordered the beige, but the color is not beige imo. It's more like a creamy off white, there's a lot more yellow tone than a beige should have, and it looks nothing like the photos in the listing. I put up against my beige pants so you can see the difference. Also it arrived very wrinkled and I didn't realize it has no pockets, so that was disappointing. I'm returning.

评论概述: Good look for an early fall sweater
评论详情: This sweater is very cute but also very thin. It is not a good choice for winter but will work great in early fall or in warmer climates.
I was thinking about getting this, and then I saw a lady at the grocery store wearing this. It looked cute on her. I also like it on me. The sleeves are very  cute.
Almost Perfect. Only reason I gave 4 stars is due to lack of pockets. Otherwise,  LOVE IT! Lots of compliments. Comfy, warm material. Fun retro style. If they added pockets I'd buy multiple colors.

I stopped ordering clothes in Amazon a while ago because nothing ended up the same as what was pictured. This ended up just like what you see. I’m not a big cardigan person, but I liked the look of this. I wasn’t disappointed. Good quality, medium thickness, and fits well.

My favorite sweater!  Kind of a throw back to a High School letter jacket.  I receive lots of compliments. This never goes out of style.  This is my second one because a friend loved it s so o much I bought her one!
I love it! True to size.
The material is soft and fit is as expected
True to size, super cute with medium warmth and weight, and it’s long enough in the arms. I’m 5’10” and it’s hit or miss with the arm length but this was perfect!
Heavy weight,  durable and great color, warm. Great price
I expected a white sweater and instead it’s a cheap-looking yellowish color. Looks nothing like the picture.
I absolutely adore it!
This oversized sweater looks great in the photos as advertised...did not see that same look when it arrived.
Great sweater, oversized & comfortable!
Love this sweater!  Looks as pictured, colors very vibrant.  Light weight enough to wear indoors.  Delivered faster than estimated!  Excellent quality.  I will wear it fall, winter and spring!

I feel it runs a little small in the body, but the arms are big, so I’m not sure if sizing up would work or not. I ordered the black, and I really like the colors on the sleeve with the black. My biggest issue with it, is that it doesn’t have pockets. I may end up returning it, mostly because of that. I should have paid more attention to the details.

评论概述: True to size and color. Soft.
评论详情: It's a good quality sweater. The stripes are vibrant in color. It's soft. The size and length are true to regular U.S sizes.
I didn’t like the feeling of this sweater as it isn’t very soft and the color and stripes didn’t do for me , but I feel it was true to size. It just didn’t do on me.
Super fun for the fall. I love the colors and the quality. Just warm enough without being too much. Adds just the right touch to an everyday look.
I love this cardigan!!! So cute!

评论概述: Not What I Thought it Would Be
评论详情: I was really excited about this sweater, based on many of the reviews I read, but it was really disappointing.  First, it fits and looks sort of like a choir robe, not an open long cardigan and the color I chose, green Khaki, is more like a tan color.  Really too bad.  Sad to have to send it back.
My new favorite cardigan for fall.  I love the colors and quality of this cardigan.  Ties together fall outfits nicely.
It looked like it was a heavier yarn in the picture. I am disappointed.
Great purchase. Pretty. Not cheap looking. Can’t wait to wear it
Terrible quality and smells horrible. I bought it because it was cream colored, but it is pink. It looks awful.

Just like it looks except mine and me are a bit larger in a large and older too but this is perfect for quick runs…car….door…etc. in Texas I love it!! Will comment again if things change after washing
Quality is good, fits great
Nice fabric..sizing was correct.  Colors were accurate as seen in the photos.  Would highly recommend as a satisfied customer

I ordered this Cardigan in green and I absolutely love it! I ordered it the size XXL  because I’m a very tall lady at 6’3” and it fits me perfectly and it’s long enough to cover my bum! and so soft! This is a 10/10 for me!

评论概述: GOOD COLORS - SOFT AND QUICK SHIPMENT
评论详情: I bought this for my niece who is very particular about the feel of clothes. It popped up in a daily for you and I thought it was perfect for her, the reviews were mixed on feel, so I ordered right away - 6 weeks early for her bday, so my sister could assess the softness and if it wasn't up to par, we could pivot. It is staying and my sister wants one as well!
Sweater is true to size.
It’s so much softer than I thought it was gonna be, size runs true so if you want a little baggier size up one size. It’s perfect!
It took some time, but not the max date eta. It looks exactly as appears, but is softer than I expected. Runs a little large so I am glad I got Small.
Got for vacation and it was great for the cool weather. Lots of compliments on the outfit.
The colors are vibrant and I receive compliments whenever I wear it. It’s also very cozy which is fully appreciated.
It's nice. A little thin but it is really needs to have pockets

I returned this one. The quality didn’t seem as good as the dark blue one that I bought - that one got a lot of complements. I didn’t end up wearing this one because it just looked a little cheap and not as cool as the dark blue one  Probably will make a nice light weight long sweater for the spring or early fall.
No pockets, other than that it’s ok
This is my go to favorite cardigan. Every time I wear it someone asks where I got it. I’ve ordered it in three different shades, and I love them all.

This cardigan is super cute. I get lots of compliments every time I wear it. It is definitely over-sized, so order your regular size if you want a baggy/loose fit; I'd even recommended going down a size. It is light weight, and nice and soft.
This is clearly used- it has pet and human hair on it and smells awful.  Beware.
We wore these to a concert. Great product. Good quality. Worked on all of our different body types. Not too warm. Just missing pockets.

I'm 5'5" and 135 lbs. I typically wear a medium in sweaters, which is what I ordered, as i like them a little loose. This cardigan runs big. I wish I would have sent it back and got a small, but thought if I washed and dried it, the sweater would shrink - it did not. The material is nice, not too thick or think. It's not cheap looking. The color on the sleeves are nice too and not just printed on. I got the grey. Again, not fantastic and not terrible.
exactly what i expected!  very comfortable

评论概述: My new favorite sweater and I own a lot of sweaters
评论详情: Love it. So freaking soft. Fits perfect. Super cute. Can't say enough.

评论概述: Super cute and cool! Constant compliments!
评论详情: I absolutely love this sweater! I got a lot of compliments from the first day I wore it! It has a summertime feel to it even though it’s a cardigan with long sleeves. it looks super cute with a tank under it with distressed jeans and white platform sneakers! I love it!

It is bulky, boring, and has no shape. You'd look cuter wrapping yourself in a blanket. It has no style, no cut, no nothing. It's a piece of knit fabric with sleeves. It was so unflattering I actually laughed when I tried it on.

I love this sweater - love the stripes on the sleeves.  The only thing I don’t like is it’s missing pockets and think if it had pockets it would be my fav of all my sweaters .  Comes down to my knees - my husband loves this on me.

I bought this sweater and it did not disappoint. It's beautiful, true to size and not thin. Keeps you comfortable and warm. I've gotten nothing but compliments while wearing it. Note, these sleeves are a bit ballooned. I think that's what adds charm to it. One of my favorite sweaters.
Bought for my artist granddaughter. She loved it!
It's been in my cart for months. I saw someone out wearing it and had to pull the trigger. I have received so many compliments already. It's not too heavy, hangs nicely, and comfortable material.

Overall, cute sweater, but the cons mean I won't be reaching for it often, so not worth it. PROS: Cute sweater. Nice details - color bands, baggy sleeve, cuff, etc. Warm, but not too hot. CONS: Builds up WAY too much static, making it hard to take on or off. Not dryer friendly, hang dry only. In the middle in terms of softness - not itchy, but could be softer. Note, "Cream" color is closer to a pale yellow.

This is even cuter in person, and I get so many compliments! I got the gray and it is perfect. The only thing I would mention is that the knit is much smaller/tighter than in the photo, but I really prefer it.

I’m 5ft tall and usually the sleeves on non petite clothes hang past my wrists, but the cuffs on this cardigan prevent that from happening. It looks so cute on and even better quality than expected. I received on Xmas morning as a gift, and I wore it all day long.
Gorgeous bold green!  Love it!
Cute sweater. Fit as expected but the color was a lot darker than I expected and it wrinkles very easily for a sweater.
Comfort
I love this cardigan! I've bought it in 4 colors. I will say the sleeves are a little long on me, but it doesn't stop me from wearing it all the time.
I wear this with everything. Every day. Any day. I can look nice in it or cuddle up in it and take a nap. I just wish it had pockets.
Really cozy and comfortable!  The rainbows are super cute!
My wife will love this. Packaged very well, was speedy getting to me. Couldn't be happier
Great fit. Warmer than expected. The colors are really vivid!
Arms balloon too much for me. Shape is okay but doesn’t hold

I should have read over the product description better before buying. The fabric isn’t soft at all. It’s pretty, but not nearly as comfy as I’d prefer. Also, it lacks pockets, which isn’t a dealbreaker but would definitely be nice.
This was a great sweater to wear to work. Goes with everything!
Runs small
Highly recommend. Runs big i got a 2X and it fits like a 3x I love it. It's warm and flowy..
This is beautiful. It is very light weight though, so be advised. Very comfy and roomy. Nice and long
This is a very cute, comfy sweater. It’s not real thick so it provides warmth without being too hot. My only complaint is that even a wash and brief tumble dry didn’t remove the creases it came with.

I was traveling from very hot Alabama to cooler Montana and didn't want a coat to take up space in my carry on.  I wore this sweater on the plane and the whole weekend I was in Montana and it was perfect.  Not too heavy to make me sweat in a crowded airport and plane but not too light so I was still comfortable while sightseeing in Montana.  The color is beautiful also.
Im an art teacher so this was perfect! i wear it everyday when my class gets too cold for me! its beautiful and soft and lightweight!
I’ve had so many compliments on this sweater. Lightweight and so comfortable.
Perfect size and length, soft, nicely made, not cheap looking, wore for outdoor casual wedding lots of compliments. Wore with above knee black dress, tall black boots… look good
The size is a a good fit. Very flattering when you wear it soft and light. Reasonable price I love it.
This is pretty. But it t does run large. I’m 5’6 160 lbs size 10 . I would size down to a medium. It’s made to be oversized. Still would be good with a medium with the same effect
I don’t usually write reviews but I love this sweater. The quality is great and so is the fit. I’ll definitely be wearing it often this fall!
